summary: The Restoring Essential Healthcare Act (H.R. 4796) aims to repeal a prohibition on Medicaid payments to certain entities established by Public Law 119-21. This bill mandates that payments for medical assistance provided by these entities under state Medicaid plans (or waivers) be made as if the original prohibition had never been enacted, covering the period from the enactment of Public Law 119-21 until the enactment of this new bill.
